<br>  

List of web links relevant to a workshop UQ agronomy students on decision support 
tools.

<br>  

## Decision support tools  

 - [StripeRustWM (Stripe Rust Wheat Manager)](https://www.agric.wa.gov.au/apps/striperustwm)  
 - [YellowSpotWM (Yellow Spot Wheat Manager)](https://www.agric.wa.gov.au/apps/yellowspotwm-yellow-leaf-spot-management)  
 - [YellowspotWM DPIRD shiny app](https://dpird.shinyapps.io/yellowspot/)
 - [UCI blackleg DPIRD shiny app](https://canola.shinyapps.io/UCI-blackleg/)
 - [ViticolR - Downy mildew in grapes](https://viticolr.paulmelloy.com.au/shiny/viticolR_dst/)
 - [Rutherglen bug model](http://203.101.227.45:5006/dashboard)

<br>
